items.title: 10 Popular AI Chatbots
items.summary: Here is a list of 10 popular AI-based chatbots Personally, I personally use these as my fav tools depending on the circumstances and situations: a) Perplexity : I have the premium version and I primarily use this for its “Deep Research” form of researching online…
items.content_html:
Here is a list of 10 popular AI-based chatbots

Product Name Co-founder/Company LLM Model Used Works Offline
ChatGPT OpenAI GPT-3.5, GPT-4 No
Poe Quora Multiple (varies) No
Gemini Advanced Google/Alphabet Gemini No
Jan.ai Jan Team Multiple (local models) Yes
Microsoft Copilot Microsoft GPT-4 No
Perplexity Perplexity AI Mistral 7B, Llama 2 No
Claude AI Anthropic Claude 3 No
Brave Leo AI Brave Mixtral 8x7B No
Layla Independent Developer Local models Yes
Phind Phind Phind-34B, Phind-70B No

Personally, I personally use these as my fav tools depending on the circumstances and situations: a) Perplexity : I have the premium version and I primarily use this for its “Deep Research” form of researching online and scraping through various websites to get the most up-to-date info. b) Grok (beta) : Elon Musk shocked the online world last week by announcing Grok (beta) on Android and iOS. I use the Android version primarily to read the news for the day since I don’t have a Twitter account. It quickly scrawls different social media communities (primarily Twitter/X though) for latest and great info. c) You.com : For when I am in a hurry and just need a fairly accurate answer on the questions I have in mind. E.g. which country is larger Oman vs. UAE.

items.title: Websites for F2F Networking
items.summary: Been using the following for the longest time to meet new people, network and understanding some of the “voices” in the market (both noise and signal): 10times Meetup.com
items.content_html:
Been using the following for the longest time to meet new people, network and understanding some of the “voices” in the market (both noise and signal):

  1. 10times
  2. Meetup.com
